attributes.action: Cap politicians expenses to just 10k per year
attributes.background: The amount of money claimed back from politicians in expenses is ridiculously high.  By reducing this amount to just 10k per year is more than enough  especially with the amount of money they get paid on top. Saving the difference can go towards paying for more nurses in our wonderful NHS.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
